title: Mandelson’s Arrest Adds to Scandal That Has Rattled Starmer and Labour Party
summary_full: The arrest of the British former envoy to Washington, long a key figure in the Labour Party, deepened a scandal that has led to calls for Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s resignation.
summary_public: The arrest of the British former envoy to Washington, long a key figure in the Labour Party, deepened a scandal that has led to calls for Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s resignation.

GB.label: neutral
GB.evidence: scandal that has led to calls for Starmer’s resignation
